title: GandaBERT: Luganda Content Classification
problem: Luganda, spoken by millions, lacks basic NLP infrastructure for information verification
description: End-to-end pipeline from dataset creation to deployed web application. Created novel 2,600-article dataset, fine-tuned Multilingual BERT achieving 85.7% accuracy across 5 categories.

caseStudy.overview: GandaBERT brings modern language understanding to Luganda, addressing the critical gap in NLP tools for African languages.
caseStudy.challenge: Luganda is a low-resource language with limited NLP datasets. Creating accurate classification required building datasets from scratch and adapting multilingual models.
caseStudy.solution: Built a novel 2,600-article dataset combining native sources, machine translation, and synthetic data. Fine-tuned Multilingual BERT with custom preprocessing for Luganda's morphological features. Deployed via FastAPI + Hugging Face Inference Endpoints + Vercel.
features: FastAPI REST backend with Hugging Face Inference

title: WaterBoard Analytics — Multi-Country Utility Dashboard
problem: Water utilities across 4 African countries lack unified analytics for operational decisions
description: Production dashboard with AI-powered natural language querying. Role-based authentication, JMP service ladder visualizations, Google Gemini integration for context-aware data assistant.

caseStudy.overview: Built during Equitech Futures Fellowship, providing actionable insights for water utility companies across Uganda, Cameroon, Malawi, and Lesotho.
caseStudy.challenge: Water utilities in developing countries lack accessible tools to visualize performance metrics and make data-driven decisions.
caseStudy.solution: Designed a role-based dashboard system with JMP service ladder visualizations and AI-powered data assistant using Google Gemini for natural language queries.
features: AI data assistant powered by Google Gemini

title: Malaria Detection & Responsible AI Research
problem: Medical imaging models can learn spurious correlations that reduce reliability in deployment
description: Investigating shortcut learning in malaria detection models using Ghana health data. Focus on model reliability and responsible AI for global health applications.
